description: Forced with CO2 emissions diagnosed from historical and yr2010CO2 simulations and all other forcings the same as in that simulation (part of the CDR-yr2010-pulse experiment).  All anthropogenic, solar, and volcanic forcing. Anthropogenic forcing includes aerosol emissions, non-CO2 greenhouse gas emissions, and land use changes.  CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. emission driven). In this experiment CO2 is first prescribed to diagnose emissions; however, the key simulations calculate the CO2 concentration.
long_name: historical emissions followed by fixed 2010 emissions (both model-diagnosed)

requirements.description: Run from 1850 for a mazimum of 5160 years.
requirements.label: 1850-7009 5160yrs max

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
